additionalVolumes.description: List of volumes, which should be mounted into Pods

mountPath.description: Path within a Pod, where the volume should be mounted.

mountPropagation.description: Mount propagation allows for sharing volumes mounted by a container to other containers in the same pod, or even to other pods on the same node.

readOnly.description: Whether mounted volume should be in read-only mode.

subPath.description: Sub-path inside the referenced volume instead of its root.

enabled.description: Enables additional high-availability related configuration, like Pod Disruption Budget and Topology Spread Constraints.

minReplicaCount.description: Minimum number of replicas being created (default: 1)

enabled.description: Service account will be created (default: false)

automountToken.title: Auto Mount Service Account Token
automountToken.description: Enables the auto mounting of the Service Account Token.
